text:
CoreSystems | Fullstack, Backend, Android, IOS, Devops, AI, QA | Berlin (DE) and Zurich area (CH ) | ONSITE, REMOTE

CoreSystems provides Field Service Management software for customers in 5 continents. Our stack is PostgreSQL, Java, Node, Angular (+ iOS / Android)
